name: Rodentated
description:
Through centuries of search the eternal computer has finally
found it's newest toy: you, the last living being, a tiny little gray mouse..
As demise is not an option, the computer keeps reviving you, after all you are it's only amusement
(apart from taking itself apart in various ways and having an inner war with itself of course)
you have no choice but to run through the trap filled corridors, dance with rockets, avoid getting
smashed by giant blocks and in the end somehow escape..

( The first flash game i ever got finished, i guess it shows but it's still dear to my heart)
